text: Net grekha nad vami (muzh'yami), yesli razvedotes' s temi zhonami, k kotorym vy ne prikasalis' i ne skrepili dogovora o predbrachnom dare. Otdayte im dobrovol'no denezhnyy dar kak spravedlivuyu kompensatsiyu za prichinonnoye im ogorcheniye soglasno vashim vozmozhnostyam i dokhodam. Etot dar yavlyayetsya blagodeyaniyem dlya dobrodetel'nykh
